response.overview: 'Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But the stakes are quickly raised when Marvin Acme is found dead and Roger is the prime suspect.
response.tagline: It's the story of a man, a woman, and a rabbit in a triangle of trouble.
response.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit

titles.title: Qui veut la peau de Roger Rabbit?
